title: 48 Days for GotaGoGama – Protestors defy weather in call for President’s resignation
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Occupy Galle Face peaceful protest is underway for the 48th day on Thursday (26) demanding President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
Many people from several areas were engaged in the Galle Face protest site also as known as #GotaGoGama yesterday (25) night.
The GotaGoGama peaceful protest site in Galle had organized a protest march yesterday (25) demanding relief in the face of a shortage of essential commodities including gas, milk powder, and fuel.
48 Days for GotaGoGama – Protestors defy weather in call for President’s resignation
